metadata.synopsis: Nickles is a savant who has an incredible ability to read the earth and stone around him, but is nervous and quite fearful as a person. He is easily frightened. He is imprisoned in moonrise and in the following lines escapes by boat (which he hates)/fights his way out/ and has a general greeting.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Teleport to the prison in moonrise towers

0.speaker: Nickels
0.text: Nimble said to close my eyes. But I can hear it - the stone is screaming.

1.speaker: Nickels
1.text: The stone says we must run! We must flee!
1.context: NodeContext: trying to be brave but very scared - running for his life

2.speaker: Nickels
2.text: Quiet. The rope is knotted tight - do not distract me.
2.context: NodeContext: tense but focused - doesn't want to be interrupted

3.speaker: Nickels
3.text: We - we have to get on the water. Wulbren said so. But I - I hate it.

4.speaker: Nickels
4.text: The walls were made with blood and pain. They hate it.
4.context: NodeContext: quietly afraid, standing still looking around

5.speaker: Nickels
5.text: Can you hear it crying? The stone... it's broken.
5.context: NodeContext: quietly afraid, standing still looking around

6.speaker: Nickels
6.text: Moonrise awakens - keep your eyes sharp, and away from me.
6.context: NodeContext: tense but focused - doesn't want to be interrupted

7.speaker: Nickels
7.text: The stone is in pain. We have to go.
7.context: NodeContext: trying to be brave but very scared - running for his life
